name: Encryption
purchased_desc: One of your fleets may support for free
flavor_text: Your captains can communicate with ease and secrecy, and are able to come to the aid of any citizen in need.

name: Fuel Efficiency
purchased_desc: Spend one less ENERGY on total move cost
flavor_text: You have developed engines with a clean burn, capable of consuming less fuel than before

name: Boosters
purchased_desc: Fleets move twice as far
flavor_text: Your shipbuilders have developed a technology capable of producing extreme speed

name: Asteroid Mining
unpurchased_desc: Harvest resources via fleets on uncolonized tiles
purchased_desc: Gain matching resource per fleet on an uncolonized tile during harvest
flavor_text: You have created machines capable of harvesting additional resources

name: Harvest Rover
unpurchased_desc: Harvest resources via fleets on colonized tiles
purchased_desc: Gain matching resource per fleet on a colonized tile during harvest
flavor_text: You have created machines capable of harvesting additional resources

name: Expanded Cargohold
purchased_desc: Harvesting using your fleets now gives you resources equal to fleet level
flavor_text: Fleets are now equipped with extra storage space due to continued reduction of technology size requirements

name: Proximity Fuse
unpurchased_desc: Gain resource when you lose a colony
purchased_desc: If an enemy takes over your colony, they give you a resource
flavor_text: You've prepared a nasty surprise for anyone who dares attack you

name: Salvage Drone
purchased_desc: If you fail an attack, the enemy gives you three resources
flavor_text: You have developed a drone capable of extracting resources from your target

name: Blockade
purchased_desc: All production in enemy colonies adjacent to your fleets is halted
flavor_text: Any foe within your range must abandon their posts and focus on the defense, for fear of total destruction

name: Defensive Turrets
unpurchased_desc: Downgrade enemy fleet when you defend
purchased_desc: If an enemy fails an attack against you, their fleet is downgraded by a level
flavor_text: You've developed planet-to-space weapons capable of targeting an fleet that tries to attack your colony

name: Disrupter Drone
unpurchased_desc: Downgrade enemy colony on failed attack
purchased_desc: If you fail an attack, your enemy downgrades their colony one level
flavor_text: Your military team has developed a weapon that leaves great destruction in your wake

name: Timeshares
purchased_desc: Harvest from one adjacent enemy colony per fleet
flavor_text: Your military is so strong, your enemies will gladly work for you in exchange for a fleeting promise of safety

name: Terraform
unpurchased_desc: Add resources or military abilities to planets
purchased_desc: Spend a resource to add a matching or military symbol to your colonized tile
flavor_text: You can modify the atmosphere and surface of your planets to make them more habitable

name: Accretion Device
purchased_desc: Spend a resource to add a matching or military symbol to a destroyed tile adjacent to your colony
flavor_text: Your scientists have developed a device capable of creating an entire habitable planet in the dead of space

name: Antimatter
purchased_desc: Destroy an uncolonized tile adjacent to your colony. Collect all matching resources
flavor_text: You have developed a weapon strong enough to obliterate any planet within range

name: Explorer1
purchased_desc: You may save or borrow actions from your next turn.

name: Explorer2
purchased_desc: You may choose how much to bid during the Exploration phase, after all other players have revealed their bids.

name: Spacetime Manipulator
purchased_desc: You may swap any explored tile with another explored tile, as long as any existing fleets or colonies remain in legal placement.

purchased_desc: One of your fleets may support for free

name: Fabricators
unpurchased_desc: Build/Upgrade fleet as a research action
purchased_desc: Build/Upgrade a fleet

name: Militarization
purchased_desc: Build/Upgrade a fleet on any of your colonies

name: Autonomous Construction
purchased_desc: Pick up or drop off fleets along your move path

name: Nanotube Polymers
purchased_desc: Spend one less resource on building a colony
flavor_text: Your architects have developed building materials strong and efficient enough, that you can build your colonies with fewer materials.

name: TempCol
unpurchased_desc: Move or place a temporary colony
purchased_desc: Move the temporary colony cube to any planet tile unoccupied by another player.

name: Cloning
purchased_desc: Move your cloning cube to any of your technology cards. This technology provides that card's effect

name: Propellant Depot
unpurchased_desc: Move fleet as a research action
purchased_desc: Move a fleet as a research action
flavor_text: Your ancestors had the forethought to place storages of fuel along the paths needed to reach other worlds

name: Wormhole
purchased_desc: Fleets can jump over one tile during move
flavor_text: No longer do asteroid belts or unknown space block your path; you have the means to jump through space to easily reach your destination

name: Dyson Sphere
purchased_desc: Move all fleets for free
flavor_text: You no longer have to worry about conserving fuel; the very stars have lended their aid to your paths of destruction
